name: Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, and until end of turn, that unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +5000. If you persona rode this turn, choose three rear-guards instead of one.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lattice
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], reveal the top card of your deck, if it is a unit card, call it to (RC), and if it isn't, put it into your hand.
[AUTO]Back Row (RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Charis
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Sylvan Horned Beast, Lattice", you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a grade 2 or less unit card, call it to (RC), and if it isn't, put it into your soul.
[CONT]Back Row (RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lotte
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Dooger
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have four or more other rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Looting Petal Stomalia
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], and until end of turn, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000.

name: Knight of Friendship, Cyrus
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], reveal the top card of your deck, if it is a unit card, call it to (RC), and if it isn't, put it into your hand.

name: Hopeful Maiden, Alejandra
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
effect:
(You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)
Additional Effect - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn!

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Jackalope
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] Trigger +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Polatter
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Valin
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Zlatorog
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)

name: Call to the Beasts
effect:
(Blitz order can only be played when you would call a guardian)
Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If you have three or more back row rear-guards, it gets [Power] +15000 instead of +5000.
